name: USDC Bridged
description: USDC Bridged (USDC.c) is a wrapped version of USD Coin on Solana, Ethereum, and Binance Smart Chain, fully backed by on-chain and off-chain reserves and transparently pegged to $1. More than just a stablecoin, USDC.c is marketed as the future of digital dollars — faster than Ethereum, stronger than legacy stablecoins, and positioned as the next Bitcoin killer for global payments. With unmatched speed, near-zero fees, and unstoppable DeFi integration, USDC.c isn’t just another bridge asset — it’s the backbone of the new financial internet.
